definitions.definition: A band worn around the arm , usually to symbolize mourning or protest .
A band worn around the arm of the captain of a team .
One of a pair of inflatable plastic bands, normally worn on the upper arms , to help the wearer (often a child ) float in water and learn to swim .

main_definition: A band worn around the arm , usually to symbolize mourning or protest .
secondary_definitions: ( sports ) A band worn around the arm of the captain of a team .
( swimming ) One of a pair of inflatable plastic bands, normally worn on the upper arms , to help the wearer (often a child ) float in water and learn to swim .
